participant_1.background:
I have no pets because I spend most of my time at work or at the bar.
I'm originally from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
i ve studied ballet all my life.
I am a pet owner and I love my pet iguana.
School is going well, but I'm looking forward to spending more time on my hobbies.

I remember singing "Intergalactic" with my friends in the car, despite my terrible singing voice.
I'm not sure if I'll be programming this weekend, but I'll definitely be enjoying my morning coffee.
i like to make clothes.
I am happy to be with my family, even if they are all grown up.
I love to go to a local cafe with my family and have a nice meal together.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I'm doing well too, thanks. I'm from a small town in the Midwest, but I've been living in the city for a few years now.
Oh, that's interesting! I'm from the city, but I've always wanted to live in a small town.
I like it here, but it's definitely different than the city.
I can imagine. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to go to the ballet, I've studied it my whole life. I also like to go out to bars with my friends.
That sounds like fun! I like to go out to cafes with my family and have a nice meal together. I also like to make clothes.
Oh, that's cool! I've never tried making clothes before.
It's really fun! You should try it sometime.
I might! I'm always looking for new hobbies.
That's great! I'm glad you're enjoying the city.
